import React from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { Modal } from 'bootstrap'; im function VideoCard({displayVideo}) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <>
{displayVideo.caption}
 Modal title I will not close if you click outside me. Do not even try to press escape key. ) } export default VideoCard
